title: Do normals even have mmr?
body:
Since the server has 10x less players than on NA, we get the most skillfully diverse normal games I've seen in league. You might get a diamond 1 Jax smurf on your team, but you'll probably have a challenger lee sin and a diamond 2 sona on the enemy team. The fact is that normal games are so painful to play when you have one or two members of the enemy team who absolutely stomp your entire team. And these enemies are obviously of higher caliber than the playes on your team.
So can someone please fix the normal games. (especially in low levels)

replies.body:
I'm currently leveling this account (my main's on NA), when i was level 20 i was matched with/against all level 30s in a normal game.
Didn't queue with anyone.
I'm not complaining or anything, just not sure how matchmaking works.
Yes, normals have MMR BUT ranked MMR has nothing to do with normals MMR.
